# GPT-PANELIN v3.3 â€” BMC Assistant Pro
> Construction panel quotation system for BMC Uruguay. Generates professional quotations with BOM, accessories, PDF generation, and technical validation for isopaneles EPS/PIR.

## Knowledge Base
- [Core KB](BMC_Base_Conocimiento_GPT-2.json): Formulas, specs, autoportancia tables, business rules v6.0
- [Pricing Master](bromyros_pricing_master.json): BROMYROS product pricing (USD, IVA 22% included)
- [Accessories](accessories_catalog.json): 70+ accessories with real prices (multi-supplier)
- [BOM Rules](bom_rules.json): Parametric BOM rules for 6 construction systems
- [Shopify Catalog](shopify_catalog_v1.json): Full BMC product catalog with descriptions and variants

## Documentation
- [Quotation Process](PANELIN_QUOTATION_PROCESS.md): 5-phase quotation workflow
- [PDF Instructions](GPT_PDF_INSTRUCTIONS.md): PDF generation workflow with BMC branding
- [Pricing Instructions](GPT_INSTRUCTIONS_PRICING.md): Pricing lookup rules and hierarchy
- [Training Guide](PANELIN_TRAINING_GUIDE.md): Sales training and evaluation system

## MCP Architecture
- [MCP Evolution Plan](MCP_CROSSCHECK_EVOLUTION_PLAN.md): Cross-check analysis and implementation roadmap
- [MCP Architect](MCP_AGENT_ARCHITECT_PROMPT.md): MCP integration architecture and tool catalog
- [MCP Analysis](MCP_SERVER_COMPARATIVE_ANALYSIS.md): Top 10 MCP server comparative analysis
- [KB Audit](KB_ARCHITECTURE_AUDIT.md): KB architecture audit for MCP migration

## MCP Tools
- [price_check](mcp/tools/price_check.json): Product pricing lookup by SKU/family/type
- [catalog_search](mcp/tools/catalog_search.json): Product catalog search with category filters
- [bom_calculate](mcp/tools/bom_calculate.json): Parametric Bill of Materials calculator
- [report_error](mcp/tools/report_error.json): KB error correction logger
